title: A Modern Comedy - paragraphs most directly present

content.question: Taken together, the fourth and fifth paragraphs most directly present

choices.label: a contrast between idealism and pragmatism
a juxtaposition of the profound and the mundane
an analogy linking personal reflection with public debate
an incongruity between private morality and the common good

content.answer: a juxtaposition of the profound and the mundane

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
